com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing

Class AbstractGanttChartActionMap<T extends AbstractGanttChart>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.ActionMap
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.AbstractGanttChartActionMap<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the Gantt chart
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGanttChartActionMap, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DualGanttChartActionMap, GanttChartActionMap

    public abstract class AbstractGanttChartActionMap<T extends AbstractGanttChart>
extends ActionMap
implements IGanttChartActionMap
    An action map, which defines the set of actions that will be available within the Gantt chart. Basically all key strokes have to be defined in ths class so that they can be used within the Gantt chart component. Using a specialized action map has the advantage that the UI can display the actions in groups inside a special selector window.
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.8 $
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    AbstractGanttChartInputMap, ActionSelector, Serialized Form

      static String ADD_HIGHLIGHTED_OBJECTS_ACTION
      A constant used as the ID for an action that adds timeline objects to the set of highlighted objects.
      static String CATEGORY_CHART
      The name used for the category under which all actions are filed that are related to the layer container.
      static String CATEGORY_OTHER
      The name used for the category under which all actions are filed that are not directly associated with the table, the timeline, or the layer container.
      static String CATEGORY_TABLE
      The name used for the category under which all actions are filed that are related to the tree table.
      static String CATEGORY_TIMELINE
      The name used for the category under which all actions are filed that are related to the timeline.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that removes all timeline objects from the set of highlighted objects.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that deletes the currently selected tree nodes.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that deletes the currently selected timeline objects.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that toggles the grid lines.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that moves the focus to the last table cell in the key column.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that moves the focus to the first table cell in the key column.

      A constant used as the ID for an action that moves the focus to the next table cell.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractGanttChartActionMap(T gc)
      Constructs a new action map for the given Gantt chart by invoking ActionMap.put(Object, javax.swing.Action) for each action ID defined in this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractGanttChartActionMap

        public AbstractGanttChartActionMap(T gc)
        Constructs a new action map for the given Gantt chart by invoking ActionMap.put(Object, javax.swing.Action) for each action ID defined in this class. Example: 
         put(GRID_ACTION, new GridAction<AbstractGanttChart>(gc));
 put(ZOOM_IN_ACTION, new ZoomInAction(gc.getDateline()));
 put(ZOOM_OUT_ACTION, new ZoomOutAction(gc.getDateline()));
 put(TOGGLE_CROSSHAIR_ACTION, new CrosshairAction(gc));
 put(TOGGLE_EVENTLINE_ACTION, new EventlineAction(gc.getTimeline()));
 put(UNDO_ACTION, new UndoAction(gc));
 put(REDO_ACTION, new RedoAction(gc));
 ...
 ...
        Parameters:
        gc - the target Gantt chart
        Since:
        1.1

    • Method Detail

      • addCategory

        public void addCategory(String category)
        Adds a category name to the map. The map comes predefined with catgories for the tree table, the timeline, the layer container and "other".
        Parameters:
        category - the name of the category to add
        Since:
        1.1

      • removeCategory

        public void removeCategory(String category)
        Removes a category name from the map.
        Parameters:
        category - the name of the category to remove
        Since:
        1.1

      • addCategoryAction

        public void addCategoryAction(String category,
                              String actionID)
        Adds an action ID to the given category.
        Parameters:
        category - the category to which the action will be added
        actionID - the ID of the action
        Since:
        1.1

      • removeCategoryAction

        public void removeCategoryAction(String category,
                                 String actionID)
        Removes an action from a category.
        Parameters:
        category - the category from which the action will be removed
        actionID - the ID of the action

      • getCategoryActions

        public Iterator<String> getCategoryActions(String category)
        Description copied from interface: IGanttChartActionMap
        Returns the action IDs that belong to the given group.

        Parameters:
        category - the name of the category
        Returns:
        the action IDs of those actions that belong to the given group

      • initCategoryActionMap

        protected void initCategoryActionMap()
        Fills the category/action map with mappings by invoking addCategoryAction(String, String) for each action ID defined in this class. Example: 
                        
 // Layer container actions
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, ADD_HIGHLIGHTED_OBJECTS_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, REMOVE_HIGHLIGHTED_OBJECTS_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, CLEAR_HIGHLIGHTED_OBJECTS_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, DELETE_TIMELINE_OBJECTS_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, TOGGLE_CROSSHAIR_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_CHART, GRID_ACTION);
 
 // Table actions
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_TABLE, MOVE_FOCUS_ABOVE_ACTION);
 addCategoryAction(CATEGORY_TABLE, MOVE_FOCUS_BELOW_ACTION);
 ...
        Since:
        1.1
